/*
 * To change this template, choose Tools | Templates
 * and open the template in the editor.
 */

/**
 *
 * @author Anomaly
 */

import java.util.*;
import java.math.*;
public class Main {

    /**
     * @param args the command line arguments
     */
    static int ct = 0;
    public static void find_ans(BigInteger a, BigInteger b){

        //System.out.println("Current a and b: " + a + "  " + b + " " + b.remainder(a));
        //if(ct > 5){
       //     return;
      //  }
      //  ct++;
        BigInteger d[] = b.divideAndRemainder(a);

        if(d[1].toString().equals("0")){
            System.out.print(d[0] + " ");
            return;
        }

        d[0] = d[0].add(new BigInteger("1"));
        System.out.print(d[0] + " ");

        a = a.multiply(d[0]);
        a = a.subtract(b);
        b = b.multiply(d[0]);

        find_ans(a,b);
    }
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // TODO code application logic here

        Scanner sc = new Scanner (System.in);

        //int t = sc.nextInt();

        while ( true ){
            //String str = sc.next();
            //System.out.println(str);
            
            String a= (sc.next());
            String b= (sc.next());
            if(a.equals("1") && b.equals("1")){
                break;
            }

            BigInteger x = new BigInteger(a);
            BigInteger y = new BigInteger(b);
            find_ans(x,y);
            System.out.println();

        }

    }

}
